title: Blended Education Program Based on the 4C/ID Model for [Large-Scale] Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theories and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling and field-applicable instructional design are required for working adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 4C/ID model components (learning objectives, supportive information, procedural information, part-task practice) to actual instructional design.
Learners can independently design blended lesson materials for teacher professional development at a rate of over 90%.
Learners can explain the procedures for verifying the effectiveness of designed educational programs through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
